Html:
Hi,
I just wondered if we have a timeframe for making the mui Link command-bindable. It would seem reasonable that besides page navigation, one might want to execute a command instead, from clicking on the link.

I notice the following posts (at the end) have requested the same thing and the solution is in the pipeline but I don't see any updates. Can we perhaps clarify the status on this?
Thank you for your continued good work..
Regards
Ike

P/S -No doubt it's not a trivial solution (I've tried) if anyone has a workaround to share in the meantime, it would be appreciated - although it would be better to have a standardised solution

http://mui.codeplex.com/discussions/438745
http://mui.codeplex.com/discussions/440932
https://mui.codeplex.com/workitem/19530
